name: RPBroadcastSampleHandler
desc: An object that processes buffer objects as received from ReplayKit.

items.name: func broadcastStarted(withSetupInfo: [String : NSObject]?)
items.desc: Perform any required actions after starting a live broadcast.

items.name: func broadcastPaused()
items.desc: Perform any required actions after a live broadcast is paused.

items.name: func broadcastResumed()
items.desc: Perform any required actions after a live broadcast is resumed.

items.name: func broadcastFinished()
items.desc: Perform any required actions after a live broadcast is finished.

items.name: func broadcastAnnotated(withApplicationInfo: [AnyHashable : Any])
items.desc: Perform any required actions after starting a live broadcast.

items.name: let RPApplicationInfoBundleIdentifierKey: String
items.desc: The key to retrieve the appâ€™s bundle identifier from the user-information dictionary.

items.name: func processSampleBuffer(CMSampleBuffer, with: RPSampleBufferType)
items.desc: Processes video and audio data as it becomes available during a live broadcast.

items.name: let RPVideoSampleOrientationKey: String
items.desc: The sample attachment key that describes the video orientation.

items.name: func finishBroadcastWithError(Error)
items.desc: Stops the broadcast and passes an error back to the broadcasting app.
